DOC.brief_summary: Descriptive registry investigate frequency HER-2 positive gastric cancer involve CNS . Exploration additional prognostic factor brain involvement gastric cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Gastric Cancer Metastasized Central Nervous System ( CNS )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : order eligible study , diagnosis gastric cancer and/or low esophageal cancer must confirm histologically . CNS involvement must confirm either via independent neuroradiological and/or positive CSF cytology . Exclusion criterion : Patients whose diagnosis confirm upon pathological review CNS involvement confirm neuroradiological review exclude study .
